description: Central registry of all automation, workflows, triggers, and scheduled tasks in the qinnovate project.

entries.name: Deploy Static Site to GitHub Pages
entries.description: Builds the Astro site (with news fetch) and deploys to GitHub Pages. Triggered on every push to main and manual dispatch.

entries.name: Update Changelog
entries.description: Generates CHANGELOG.md from git log using changelog-update.mjs. Skips auto: and chore: commits to avoid loops. Creates GitHub Releases for tier-3 commits.

entries.name: Security Audit Pipeline
entries.description: Scans for secrets and PII using custom audit.py. Runs on Python file changes, PRs, weekly schedule (Sundays midnight UTC), and manual dispatch. Uploads SARIF to GitHub Security tab.
entries.trigger: push to main/develop (Python paths), pull_request, schedule (cron: 0 0 * * 0), workflow_dispatch

entries.name: Update News Feed Cache
entries.description: Fetches RSS feeds daily at noon EST (17:00 UTC) and commits the updated cache. A cache change triggers deploy.yml via the resulting push.

entries.name: Verify Citations & Facts
entries.description: Runs the verification pipeline (scripts/verify/run_all.py) on paper, blog, TARA, and QIF framework changes. Uploads a verify-report.json artifact.
entries.trigger: pull_request (paper/blogs/shared/qif-framework paths), push to main (blogs/qif-framework paths)

entries.name: Sync Wiki
entries.description: Copies README files from main repo into the GitHub Wiki repository. Generates a sidebar navigation. Triggered on README changes to main.
outputs: GitHub Wiki pages (Home, QIF-Framework, ONI-Framework, Governance, Classical-Quantum-Bridge)

entries.name: Timeline Staleness Check
entries.description: Runs timeline-check.mjs in dry-run mode on push to main. Warns if qif-timeline.json stats appear stale compared to git history.

entries.name: Dependabot Auto-Merge
entries.description: Auto-approves and squash-merges Dependabot PRs for patch and minor version updates. Comments on major updates requiring manual review.
outputs: Auto-merged PRs, PR comments on major updates

entries.name: Field Journal to Blog Post
entries.description: Converts new QIF-FIELD-JOURNAL.md entries into blog posts via field-journal-to-blog.mjs, fact-checks them with Python, then commits to blogs/.

entries.name: Publish qtara to PyPI
entries.description: Builds and publishes the qtara Python package to PyPI using trusted publishing. Creates a GitHub Release with install instructions.
entries.trigger: push to main (shared/qtara-registrar.json, shared/qtara/** paths), workflow_dispatch

entries.name: Accessibility Check (WCAG 2.1 AA)
entries.description: Runs WCAG 2.1 AA compliance checks after PyPI publish or on manual trigger. Creates an accessibility badge. Currently disabled (references legacy MAIN/ paths).

entries.name: Auto Generate Index
entries.description: Uses GitHub Models (gpt-4o-mini) to auto-generate a GLOSSARY.md from repo structure. Creates a PR with the result. Disabled (references legacy MAIN/ paths).

entries.name: Generate Roadmap
entries.description: Generates ROADMAP.md from project/prd.json using a Python script. Disabled (legacy project structure).

entries.name: Publish Legacy Packages to PyPI
entries.description: Builds and publishes oni-framework, oni-tara, and oni-academy to PyPI. Disabled (legacy packages superseded by qtara).

entries.name: QA Checks
entries.description: Comprehensive QA suite: brand consistency, import validation, formula consistency, link validation, HTML validation, metadata validation. Disabled (references legacy MAIN/ paths).
entries.trigger: push to main, pull_request, schedule (cron: 0 6 * * 0), workflow_dispatch
outputs: GitHub step summaries for each QA job

entries.name: Security Scan (Legacy)
entries.description: Full security suite: Bandit, Safety, CodeQL (Python + JS), web security patterns. Disabled (references legacy MAIN/ paths, superseded by security-audit.yml).
entries.trigger: push to main (Python/HTML/JS/TS paths), pull_request, schedule (cron: 0 9 * * 1), workflow_dispatch
outputs: Bandit JSON reports, Safety reports, CodeQL SARIF

entries.name: Sync Brand to Docs
entries.description: Syncs brand.json changes to README and docs via sync_brand.py. Disabled (legacy brand structure).

entries.name: Tests (Legacy)
entries.description: Multi-platform Python test suite for oni-framework, tara, and oni-academy across Python 3.9-3.12 on Ubuntu and macOS. Disabled (legacy packages).
entries.trigger: push to main (legacy package paths), pull_request, workflow_dispatch

entries.name: Validate Docs
entries.description: Validates the content manifest (docs/content-manifest.json) against actual files. Disabled (legacy doc structure).
entries.trigger: push to main (docs/content-manifest.json, MAIN/**, autodidactive/**, docs/**), pull_request

entries.name: Timeline Staleness Check (local)
entries.description: Detects stale stats and missing milestones in qif-timeline.json by scanning git log. Supports --dry-run and --fix modes.

entries.name: Fetch News RSS Feeds
entries.description: Fetches RSS feeds from configured sources and writes the cache file. Called by deploy.yml and update-news.yml.
entries.trigger: manual (node scripts/fetch-news.mjs), called by deploy and update-news workflows

entries.name: Changelog Generator
entries.description: Generates CHANGELOG.md entries from git log with tier-based classification. Called by changelog.yml workflow.
entries.trigger: manual (node scripts/changelog-update.mjs), called by changelog workflow

entries.name: Field Journal to Blog Converter
entries.description: Converts QIF-FIELD-JOURNAL.md entries into individual blog post markdown files. Called by field-journal-blog.yml workflow.
entries.trigger: manual (node scripts/field-journal-to-blog.mjs), called by field-journal-blog workflow

entries.name: Transparency Sync Check
entries.description: Checks if TRANSPARENCY.md validation table is in sync with the Derivation Log. Ensures cross-AI validation sessions are properly recorded.

entries.name: Sync Agents to CLAUDE.md
entries.description: Refreshes CLAUDE.md project guide with current project structure, tech stack, and configuration. Called via npm run sync.
entries.trigger: manual (node scripts/sync-agents.mjs or npm run sync)

entries.name: BCI Device Research Crawler
entries.description: Scan FDA filings (510(k), PMA databases) and arXiv for new BCI device submissions, approvals, and research papers. Would populate a structured feed for the research team.

entries.name: qif.json Cross-Reference Validation
entries.description: Cross-reference all data files (qif-timeline.json, qtara-registrar.json, milestones.json, glossary-constants.ts) for consistency errors: missing IDs, orphaned references, stale counts, duplicate entries.

entries.name: Research Sources Sync Check
entries.description: Verify QIF-RESEARCH-SOURCES.md is current by scanning paper/references.bib, blog posts, NSP spec, TARA techniques, and website pages for citations not yet recorded in the sources file.

entries.name: Timeline Staleness Auto-Fix
entries.description: Scheduled version of timeline-check.mjs that runs with --fix and commits updated stats automatically. The current workflow only warns; this would auto-fix.

entries.name: Update Automation Registry
entries.description: Queries the GitHub Actions API for the latest run status of each workflow and updates automation-registry.json. Commits if anything changed.
